author: IGN
description:
Don't miss the PS5 Mods Update 1.4 Trailer for Arma Reforger, a first-person shooter game developed by Bohemia Interactive. Players on PS5 can now enjoy mods with the long-awaited Update 1.4. Players can download mods for detailed terrains and weapons to custom game modes, factions, vehicles, and more. Users can now access the in-game Workshop and explore a library of community-made content. Update 1.4 for Arma Reforger is available now for PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X|S, and PC (Steam).

#ArmaReforger #Gaming #IGN
title: Arma Reforger - Official PS5 Mods Update 1.4 Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Take a look at the Wishlist Trailer for Bigfoot Life, a Bigfoot adventure simulation game developed by Planet 47 Games. Players will catch and eat fish alongside foraging in the forest for mushrooms, berries, and more to live the Bigfoot life. Build shelters to store items in to get through the harsh winters, and watch out for human hunters. Bigfoot Life is coming soon to PC (Steam) with a demo coming soon as part of Steam Next Fest on June 9.

#BigfootLife #Gaming #IGN
title: Bigfoot Life - Official Wishlist Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Don't miss the Battle for Brooklyn DLC Launch Trailer for The Division 2, a third-person co-op action shooter developed by Massive Entertainment and Ubisoft. Players will fight for the fate of Brooklyn, now at risk as the Cleaners are set to return and finish what they started in New York. Check out the latest trailer showcasing new content in the Battle for Brooklyn DLC for The Division 2, available now for PlayStation 4 (PS4), Xbox One, and PC.

#TheDivision2 #Gaming #IGN
title: The Division 2 - Official Battle for Brooklyn DLC Launch Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Blacktail developer Parasight has announced Davy x Jones, a new first-person action-adventure game where you play as infamous pirate Davy Jones. The catch? You're headless, and you'll wield that severed skull – along with plenty of weapons – as you seek your revenge against Blackbeard. 

Wishlist Davy x Jones on Steam if you're interested: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2611170/DAVY_x_JONES/

#DavyXJones #IGN #Gaming
title: Davy x Jones: Official Reveal Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Take a look at the Demo Announcement Trailer for Leaf Blower Co., a relaxing outdoor leaf cleaning simulation game developed by LifT Games. Players will find themselves at the beginning of their Leaf Blowing career in a quiet town of New England. Progress across a suite of jobs to clean up leaves, take on more jobs in diverse locations, and work through rain, fog, and even snow. Leaf Blower Co. is coming soon to PC (Steam) with a demo available now.

#LeafBlowerCo #Gaming #IGN
title: Leaf Blower Co. - Official Demo Announcement Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Check out 10 minutes of developer-narrated gameplay from Phase Zero, the upcoming PS1-era-styled survival horror game set in the virus-infected, zombie-ridden town of Flint Peak. A playable demo is coming very soon. 

Wishlist Phase Zero on Steam if you're interested: https://store.steampowered.com/app/3462190/PHASE_ZERO/

#PhaseZero #Gameplay #IGN
title: Phase Zero: 10 Minutes of Developer-Led Gameplay

author: IGN
description:
Check out the Gameplay Trailer for Total Chaos, a first-person survival horror game developed by Trigger Happy Interactive. Players will explore the horrors of Fort Oasis, an abandoned mining outpost, to make use of resource management mechanics, methodical melee combat and gunplay, and haunting visuals with grotesque environments and creatures. Total Chaos is coming soon to PC (Steam) and SteamVR, with a demo available now.

#TotalChaos #Gaming #IGN
title: Total Chaos - Official Gameplay Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Watch the Fahkumram Gameplay Trailer for Tekken 8, an action fighting game developed by Bandi Namco. Get a first look at gameplay for Fahkumram's debut in the latest Tekken experience with Tekken 8. Fahkumram is launching into Early Access on July 7 with a full release on July 10 for Season 2 of Tekken 8, available now for PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X|S, and PC.

#Tekken8 #Gaming #IGN
title: Tekken 8 - Official Fahkumram Gameplay Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Check out this The Last of Us show VS game comparison video! The Last of Us Season 2 Episode 7 finale has arrived on HBO and there are a lot of similarities to be made when comparing the seventh episode of TLOU TV show to the iconic TLOU2 game, developed by Naughty Dog.

Beware of spoilers ahead for The Last of Us Series! See how close the show's creators got to the original moments in our episode seven comparison.

What did you think of this The Last of Us S2 vs The Last of Us Part 2 comparison? Let us know in the comments!

#IGN #Games #TLOU #TheLastOfUs
title: The Last of Us Season 2 Episode 7: TV Show vs Game Comparison

author: IGN
description:
Doom: The Dark Ages is the newest entry in the legendary Doom series, renowned for its challenging combat and well-hidden secrets. In this Doom: The Dark Ages collectibles video guide, we will show you where to find every collectible. Follow along and reveal every gold piece, ruby, codex, demonic essence upgrade, weapon skin, toy, and secret area.

Don’t miss the Secret Key or Ammo Upgrades in Chapter 17, Temple of Lomarith! For more Doom: The Dark Ages tips and strategies, head to IGN for our full Wiki guide at https://www.ign.com/wikis/doom-the-dark-ages

01:41 - Secret Area 3/9

12:20 -
title: Doom: The Dark Ages - Chapter 17 Temple of Lomarith | All Collectibles (Upgrades, Secret Areas)
